parts.text: {"word":"attenuated","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"弱められた、減衰された、薄められた、細くなった","english_definition":"reduced in force, intensity, effect, quantity, or value; thinned or weakened.","examples":[{"sentence":"The attenuated sunlight barely reached the forest floor.","translation":"弱められた太陽光は、ほとんど森の地面に届かなかった。"},{"sentence":"The vaccine contains an attenuated form of the virus.","translation":"そのワクチンは、弱毒化されたウイルスを含んでいる。"},{"sentence":"His attenuated voice betrayed his illness.","translation":"彼の弱々しい声は、彼の病気を物語っていた。"},{"sentence":"The company's profits were attenuated by the economic downturn.","translation":"その会社の利益は、景気後退によって減衰した。"}],"collocations":["attenuated virus (弱毒化ウイルス)","attenuated sunlight (弱められた太陽光)","attenuated effect (弱められた効果)","attenuated response (弱められた反応)","attenuated form (弱められた形)","attenuated strain (弱毒化株)"],"synonyms":["weakened","reduced","diminished","decreased","lessened","thinned","diluted","impaired","debilitated"],"antonyms":["strengthened","enhanced","increased","amplified","intensified","thickened"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(他動詞)弱める、減衰させる、薄める、細くする","english_definition":"to reduce the force, effect, or value of; to weaken or thin.","examples":[{"sentence":"The noise was attenuated by the thick walls.","translation":"騒音は厚い壁によって弱められた。"},{"sentence":"The government tried to attenuate the impact of the new tax.","translation":"政府は新しい税の影響を弱めようとした。"},{"sentence":"The artist attenuated the lines of the drawing to create a softer effect.","translation":"アーティストは、より柔らかい効果を生み出すために、絵の線を細くした。"}],"collocations":["attenuate the effect (効果を弱める)","attenuate the impact (影響を弱める)","attenuate the risk (リスクを軽減する)","attenuate the pain (痛みを和らげる)","attenuate the sound (音を弱める)"],"synonyms":["weaken","reduce","diminish","decrease","lessen","thin","dilute","impair","mitigate","alleviate"],"antonyms":["strengthen","enhance","increase","amplify","intensify"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(自動詞)弱まる、減衰する、薄まる、細くなる","english_definition":"to become weaker, thinner, or less effective.","examples":[{"sentence":"The sound attenuated as we moved further away.","translation":"遠ざかるにつれて、音は弱まっていった。"},{"sentence":"His enthusiasm attenuated over time.","translation":"彼の熱意は時間とともに薄れていった。"},{"sentence":"The signal attenuated due to interference.","translation":"信号は干渉のために減衰した。"}],"collocations":["attenuate over time (時間とともに弱まる)","attenuate with distance (距離とともに弱まる)","attenuate due to (～によって弱まる)"],"synonyms":["weaken","decrease","diminish","fade","decline","wane"],"antonyms":["strengthen","increase","intensify"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「attenuare」（薄くする、弱める）から派生。ad-（～へ）+tenuare（薄くする）に分解され、tenuis（薄い）に由来する。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/əˈtɛnjueɪtɪd/","syllables":"at-ten-u-a-ted"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["attenuate","attenuates"],"past_simple":"attenuated","past_participle":"attenuated","present_participle":"attenuating"},"adjective_forms":{"comparative":"more attenuated","superlative":"most attenuated"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**attenuated**」は、何かが弱められたり、減衰されたり、薄められたりした状態を表す言葉です。物理的なもの（光、音、信号など）だけでなく、抽象的なもの（効果、影響、熱意など）にも使用できます。医学の分野では、ワクチンに使用される弱毒化されたウイルスを指す場合によく使われます。動詞として使用する場合は、他動詞と自動詞の両方の用法があり、それぞれ「弱める」と「弱まる」という意味になります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The attenuated patient needed rest.","correct":"✓ The debilitated patient needed rest.","note":"「attenuated」は「弱められた」という意味で、患者の状態を表す場合は「debilitated」（衰弱した）の方が適切です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The sound was attenuate.","correct":"✓ The sound was attenuated.","note":"形容詞として使う場合は、過去分詞形の「attenuated」を使用します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["attenuation (名詞: 減衰、弱化、希釈)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"C1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低頻度 (Relatively low frequency) - 専門的な文脈でよく使われる。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"「**attenuated**」は、何か（物理的なものや抽象的なもの）が弱められた、減衰された、または薄められた状態を表す形容詞です。例えば、ワクチンに使われるウイルスが弱毒化されている場合や、音が距離によって小さくなる場合などに使われます。動詞としても使われ、「attenuate」は「弱める」または「弱まる」という意味を持ちます。科学、医学、工学などの専門的な分野でよく見られる単語です。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The **attenuated** vaccine is safer than the original.","translation":"弱毒化されたワクチンは、元のワクチンよりも安全だ。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"弱められた"},{"sentence":"The signal was **attenuated** by the long cable.","translation":"信号は長いケーブルによって減衰された。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"減衰された"},{"sentence":"The company tried to **attenuate** the negative publicity.","translation":"会社はネガティブな広報活動を弱めようとした。","type":"verb (transitive)","meaning_category":"弱める"},{"sentence":"The sound of the music **attenuated** as they walked away.","translation":"彼らが歩き去るにつれて、音楽の音は弱まっていった。","type":"verb (intransitive)","meaning_category":"弱まる"}]}
